content: These fat tire electric golf scooters will turn your commute from hole to hole into the most entertaining part of your next golf game. The relatively compact size of the scooters helps reduce wear on courses when compared to regular 4-wheeled golf carts.

Experience your favorite games and movies like never before by installing this motion and vibration sofa device. Simply place it under your couch’s feet and it will dynamically generate a range of motions so that you can experience every explosion and sharp turn.

titleEN: A Piece Of The Original Death Star
content: Prove you’re the ultimate Star Wars fan in town by adding this piece of the original Death Star to your collection. This 23.7″ x 11.7″ x 1.8″ piece of the Death Star is intricately detailed, remains in good condition, and comes with a letter of authenticity.

Do your part to cut down on the millions of stir sticks that are thrown into the trash each day by setting your beverage down on Stircle – the coffee stirring machine. Simply place your drink on the small motorized platform and it will spin until your coffee is perfectly mixed.

Celebrate Mega Man 2’s 30th anniversary in style by acquiring this special edition cartridge. Apart from its striking blue color, this playable NES cartridge comes in an embossed, foiled box with upgraded dual fold cover and a foreword by Mega Man historian Salvatore Pane.

This innovative ground fridge is a contemporary 21st century take on the classic root cellar. It features a built-in staircase to safely descend and boasts a storage capacity of six refrigerators – enough to store the contents of a 2,600 square foot garden.

Give your home some incredible depth by creating amazing visual effects with these 3D illusion floors. Rather than contend with a boring, flat surface, the 3D epoxy designs will transform your room with mind blowing effects.

Bosch is looking to minimize bike related accidents with their new anti-slip motorcycle jet thrusters. This gas-powered anti-slide system for bikes will employ small side thrusters that will exhaust gas in order to generate the repulsion force necessary to prevent slipping.

Whether you’re driving in the city, the country, or down zombie infested streets, this Hummer H1 Launch Edition is your go-to vehicle. Hand-built and assembled in Wichita, it boasts an electronically controlled 6.6 liter, 500 hp engine and is available in 5 cab configs.

titleEN: Floating Dock With A Water Hammock
content: Turn any calm body of water into your own piece of paradise by lounging around on top of this floating dock with a water hammock. It features a 4 foot square hammock ideal for in-water relaxation sandwiched between a 3′ x 7′ and a 7′ x 7′ platform.

Improve your overall riding performance by practicing with this indoor cycling turbo trainer in between races. It gives you the opportunity to vary your training with tons of different virtual reality environments while providing you with training programs based on specific goals.

Curtis Motorcycles has unveiled Zeus – the world’s first e-twin motorcycle! Slated for release sometime in 2020, the cutting-edge Zeus electric motorcycle will have a 14-kWh battery that will feed a pair of high-output electric motors.

Many watch microbrands on the market have a hard time standing out. That, however, has not been a problem for Zinvo – they have made a name for themselves creating incredibly unique men’s watches with eye-catching designs with spinning dial.

The ingenious design of the modular refrigerator makes it possible to up-size the capacity of your fridge depending on your current needs. It can be controlled from your smartphone and lets you add components ranging from a water purifier to an oven or wine rack.

Experience the crispest sound in the universe by playing your tunes out of this Infinity Gauntlet Bluetooth speaker. Based on the Mad Titan’s Infinity Gauntlet it boasts a large 70mm driver and delivers HiFi quality sound that will please any audiophile.

Make the most out of your limited space by bringing the house cube into your living quarters. This multi-disciplinary cube redefines the standard for compact living by elegantly providing you with everything from a living room to a bathroom in a 10′ x 10′ x 10′ space.

Develop the skills necessary to conquer towering rock walls from the comfort of home with help from this rock climbing practice wall. It features an ample 10′ L x 4′ W climbing surface with 40 colored training holds and can be angled anywhere from -5° to -50°.

Avoid getting disapproving looks when you’re off trotting the globe by making sure to wear this “sorry about our president” shirt. This hilarious and tragically necessary shirt displays the succinct message in 14 different languages including Slovenian and Mandarin.

Improve your eating habits with help from BitBite – the wearable nutrition tracking device. It rests comfortably in your ear and analyzes chewing sounds via a microphone so it knows when, where, what, and how you are eating.

One of the most iconic weapons in film history is available for auction – Han Solo’s blaster from Episode VI! This blaster was the same one used by Harrison Ford in the classic Star Wars film Return of the Jedi and can be yours for just a few hundred thousand dollars!

Claim dominance over every over kite at the park by commanding the skies with this ten foot wingspan dragon kite! This massive kite is crafted from durable ripstop polyester and supported by a fiberglass frame composed of struts and cross-pieces.

Flat tires will soon become a thing of the past thanks to these airless 3D printed bicycle tires. Mechanical engineering firm BigRep has designed a 3D printed tire flexible enough to fit onto a regular tire hub can handle typical road conditions with relative ease.

The Honshu Boshin Katana features an impossibly sharp, full tang, 1060 high carbon steel blade that’s just over 30” and can literally cut through a cinder block like a hot knife through butter. Talk about intimidating!

Scarf down wings like the 1% by digging into a plate of these mouth-watering 24K gold chicken wings. Available in either a 10, 20, or 50 piece servings, each delectable piece is brined for 12 hours in gold coconut butter-chipotle honey and coated in a layer of edible gold dust.

With more and more vehicles crowding the streets every year, SeaBubble is looking to relieve some of that congestion with their River Taxis. These hydrofoiling watercraft will be able to be summoned via an app on your smartphone just like an Uber taxi.

Help maintain your sanity on a daily basis by slipping into the blackout relaxation hoodie. It features a fully closable visor made from a breathable mesh fabric that allows you to see out while blocking everyone else from looking in.

Own your very own internet meme by getting your hands on this 3D printed Sad Keanu figurine. This wildly popular internet meme of Keanu Reeves looking sad on a bench is without a doubt a must have collector’s item for any serious internet meme historian.

Feel like a mighty sorcerer every time you make a purchase by storing all your cash in this spellbook wallet. Styled to look like an ancient spellbook, it features a divided zippered pocket along with an ID slot and 14 additional card slots.

Experience the thrill of a lifetime as you jump around the dark abyss that is the bouncy trampoline cave. Deep under the Earth’s surface you’ll find a subterranean world of wonder as you jump and frolic over some of the world’s biggest trampolines.

Go on a sugar rush for the ages by devouring this heavenly and calorie dense anatomically correct gummy heart. Approximately the same size and weight as a real human heart, this massive 1.5 pound 1,680 calorie treat features a yummy fruity cherry flavor.

In an effort to reduce littering caused by discarded gum, Amsterdam publicity firm Publicis One and shoe brand Gumdrop have created the Gumshoe – a sneaker with a unique pink colored sole made using recycled chewing gum picked up from the streets of Amsterdam.

Send the upright citizens of LEGOville on the ride of their lives by adding this LEGO roller coaster creation set to your vast collection. This fully functional chain model coaster comes with everything from train cars to ride attendants and even LEGO min-fig riders.

In a noble attempt to prolong the inevitable, the U.S. Postal Service is trying to make snail mail great again with these scratch-and-sniff postal stamps. Each book of 20 stamps comes with vibrant designs and scents like chocolate, blueberry, and cola.

Keep your little buccaneers cool and entertained all summer long by blasting them with the backyard water cannon. Inspired by the Royal Navy’s 24-pounder guns used during the Age of Sail, it is capable of shooting a steady stream of water up to 25 feet away.

Separate yourself from every other collector by getting your hands on these Star Wars insect posters. UK-based illustrator Richard Wilkinson has created a series of masterpieces in which insects are painted to resemble famous Star Wars characters like R2-D2.

Brave Robotics, Asratec Corp, and Sansei Technologies have joined forces to build a real life working transformer! J-deite RIDE is the eye-catching vehicle that is capable of going from an automobile to an Autobot right before your very eyes.

No one is safe from the zombie apocalypse, not even lawn gnomes. On the bright side, these flesh-eating zombies serve as great lawn ornaments once all hell breaks loose. They’ll keep your home safe by attacking any scavengers who come near your yard.

Sugar, spice, and everything nice – the exact opposite of what the evil hot gummy bears are. Though they look like normal gummy bears – they’re far from it. So go ahead and watch your friends eat handfuls of them, only to see them cry in agony moments later.

The Blloc minimalist smartphone aims to simplify your smartphone experience by removing superfluous interactions and placing all app usage into a single monochromatic timeline that is designed to help with smartphone and social media addiction.

Go for the ride of your life in the ultimate collectors item when you get behind the wheel of this replica DeLorean time machine. The DeLorean comes equipped with a replica flux capacitor and a fully functional time display board. Plutonium sold separately.

Switch from playing one sport to another instantly with this revolutionary 5-in-1 sports ball. The ball enables you to easily alternate between a game of soccer, football, baseball, golf or flying disc in an easy to operate fashion – so that you can dominate in any game.

Grow your own ‘shrooms with this all-in-one mushroom grow kit! These grow kits make it fun and easy to grow your own mushrooms at home. Everything you need to grow mushrooms – except spores – is included in each kit. Perfect for the ‘shroom enthusiast!

Why waste time learning a second language when you can just use this live conversation speaking translator?Each side of the device has an integrated microphone that captures dialogue, automatically translates the message, and relays it to the other person.

Remain at the ideal temperature when you venture into the cold by putting on this intelligent heated jacket. This stylish everything-proof jacket employs A.I. to learn your preferences and warm you up to the perfect temperature using the built-in carbon fiber heating elements.

titleEN: Fret Zealot LED Guitar Learning System
content: Fret Zealot is a LED strip that you install on that guitar sitting in your closet. Wireless Bluetooth connection to the free Android or iOS app. Tens of thousands of songs, video lessons, and more. Follow the lights and unleash your inner rock star!

Own a piece of cinematic history by adding this Terminator 2 Harley Davidson motorcycle to your collection. This 1991 Harley Davidson Fat Boy bike was actually used during the filming of the now iconic Terminator 2: Judgement Day.

Treat yourself to a mind blowing light show whenever you check the time on the infinity mirror clock. This one of a kind timepiece hangs elegantly on the wall and features a flurry of multicolored LEDs that display the time in a captivating RGB format.

Surprise your taste buds with a delightful mix of freshness and fruitiness by biting into a ruby chocolate Kit Kat bar. Made using the recently discovered Ruby cocoa bean, it features an intense berry flavor without the addition of any additional additives.

Create the ultimate centerpiece at your kid’s birthday party with this 26 pound edible gummy bear. Packed with an astounding 32,000 calories, this gummy bear is guaranteed to feed an army of children, or give a heart attack to one adult sized human!

Go on the journey of a lifetime by booking your stay on this 245 day ultimate world cruise. This incredible voyage includes stops at 113 of the world’s greatest cities and charming smaller ports in addition to overnight stays in 23 exotic destinations.

When all hell breaks loose, there’s no better option than the Plasan Yagu armored car. Powered by a 95 bhp 1.0-liter V-twin engine this 4-wheel drive vehicle features 360 degree armored plating, an integrated drone, and remote controlled weapons system.

Send your little one to dreamland in style by booking him a nightly passage aboard the Sky One kid’s plane bed. Inspired by Skipper from the Disney movie Planes, this whimsical bed will turn bedtime into an adventure your kid will actually look forward to.

Optimized for teams that want to connect, co-create, and produce with others regardless of their location, Surface Hub 2 brings together the best of Microsoft collaboration tools – from Windows and Office to Microsoft Whiteboard and Microsoft Teams.

BUDK.com is offering the M48 Tactical Tomahawk at an unbelievable deal of BUY ONE GET ONE FREE! Click the link or use the promo code BKTWBTA at checkout. Available only to This Is Why I’m Broke readers so you better hurry! Limited time only!

Spicy food lovers rejoice! To mark their 150th anniversary, Tabasco has released a limited edition Diamond Reserve hot sauce. It combines aged peppers with sparkling white wine vinegar for an exquisite and spicy taste unlike you’ve ever experienced.

The Urwerk AMC clock and watch delivers precision timekeeping unmatched by standard timepieces. The 55-pound aluminum base comes with a specialized cradle for the watch that automatically winds it, sets the time, and adjusts the balance rate.

Mad scientist and Youtuber Jairus Of All has constructed a fire vortex cannon capable of shooting a swirling steady stream of fire at distances of up to twenty feet away thanks to a series of powerful built-in fans and ductwork.

Give your work space a little Imperial flair by switching on this TIE fighter poseable desk lamp. This officially licensed USB powered lamp can be adjusted to any height and angle for maximum convenience – making it the perfect lighting fixture for any Star Wars fan.

Turn heads by driving down the road in the Rolls-Royce’s Cullinan – the first ever SUV from the world renowned luxury car manufacturer. It boasts a powerful 563HP twin turbo V-12 in addition to all the lavish amenities you’ve come to expect from a Rolls-Royce.

Stay clean and feeling fresh while you’re enjoying the great outdoors by packing this portable hot shower device. It can heat up to four quarts of water in about twenty minutes and comes with a built-in hose that provides a continuous but controlled water flow.

Increase your chances of survival in emergency situations with help from the first 24 hours survival kit. Inside the sturdy case you’ll find a set of essential tools and weapons necessary to ensure you stay alive during the rough early moments of societal collapse.

Win the award for parent of the year by booking a stay at the LEGOLAND castle hotel. Each individually themed room in the hotel features a children’s sleeping area complete with bunk beds, a trundle bed, a TV set, and a LEGO building station.

This rideable electric TIE fighter is a testament to what one motivated Star Wars fan can do with a little creativity and elbow grease. This 1/3rd scale TIE fighter is powered by electric wheelchair motors that let it smoothly cruise down the road at 6 miles per hour.

Class up your next rager by keeping your thirsty guests hydrated with the wine keg. This 23 inch tall by 11 inch wide keg is filled with 19.5 liters of steel-fermented chardonnay with bright aromas of stone fruit and green apple.

The Void is a first of its kind virtual reality theme park that allows you to explore a full immersive virtual world untethered. Just strap on the full body haptic suit and you’ll be fully integrated into completely fictionalized worlds brought to life – like Ghostbusters!

When the effects caused by global warming inevitably flood our cities, rest easy knowing that you’ll still be able to live in luxury by moving to the Wayaland floating city. This concept depicts a small self-sustained city complete with shops, restaurants, and a tennis court.

These 3D hexagon wireless speakers make it possible to enjoy crisp music flowing throughout your home in a beautifully unobtrusive manner. This unique speaker system is composed of three dimensional modular hexagons that can be arranged in any way you like.

Treat your taste buds to a flurry of flavor and texture by popping a handful of peanut butter popcorn into your mouth. Each bag contains a tasty mix of airy popcorn with roasted peanuts covered with cane sugar and tapioca syrup-sweetened peanut butter.

No laundromat nearby? It’s no problem when you have this trusty foot powered portable washing machine by your side. This eco-friendly washer requires no electricity and uses small amounts of water – reducing your carbon footprint.

Ensure your little adrenaline junkie grows up to have a fondness for all things on two wheels by placing this moto rocker racer for kids in his room. Each pint-sized bike is designed as a downscaled motorcycle to mimic the feeling of zooming down the road on a bike.

Give your home a futuristic sci-fi feel by letting the HAL 9000 wall clock inform you of the time. This battery operated clock’s face is designed to look like the haunting red eye of the HAL 9000 from the iconic film 2001: A Space Odyssey.

Ensure your prime cuts of meat are cooked to mouth-watering perfection every time by sticking them inside the Beefer high temperature grill. This German-made grill utilizes a top-down heating method to cook at the optimum grilling temperature – 1500°F.

Whether it’s a horde of zombies or a flood of biblical proportions, the flying ATV is the ultimate post apocalyptic getaway vehicle. It features a versatile design for easy off-road travel, and its propeller and paraglider wing allow it to fly at altitudes of 15,000 feet.

Feel like you’re effortlessly gliding over concrete by hopping aboard the GeoBlade electric hoverboard. It boasts a 7 mile range, top speed of 15 miles per hour, and features a gyro-stabilized one-wheeled design that provides the thrill of surfing over land.

Holy hotrod Batman, the 1966 Batmobile is up for auction! Auto-enthusiast Jim Semershein transformed this 1959 Thunderbird into such a convincing replica of the iconic Batmobile that the original Batmobile designer George Barris granted this replica the status of original.

Ensure everyone has a blast at your upcoming nuptials by renting one of these majestic bouncy castles for your special day. British company A Wedding Wonderland rents out these bespoke bouncy castles complete with lovely floral arrangements.

Transform your plain yard into a lively natural paradise with this monarch butterfly attracting sanctuary. It can be easily set up and helps you create the ideal environment for butterflies to grow and flourish without fear from predators like nearby birds.

If long distance running is your thing, feast your eyes on the Nike Zoom VaporFly Elite Flyprints. Designed with direct input from legendary marathon runner Eliud Kipchoge, they’re ultra lightweight, fully breathable, and feature a 3D printed textile upper.

The Fifth Element weather station makes it possible to stay on top of current weather conditions. This weather station houses a thermometer, a hygrometer, a barometer, and a clock that can stay powered on for 72 hours thanks to the built-in power reserve.

Halfbike brings a completely new experience to anyone seeking the new challenge. A new type of vehicle that awakes your natural instinct to move and makes you feel like a kid again. It’s foldable, compact, and light so that you can take it anywhere with you.

Navigate the underwater realms as easily as you cruise across land with the submarine sports car. Inspired by 007’s Lotus in the Spy Who Loved Me, this sexy little auto comes with built-in scuba tanks so that you can explore the ocean floor in style.

Venture off the grid without foregoing life’s modern comforts by travelling inside of the EarthCruiser Explorer XPR440. This off-roading behemoth features a heavy-duty exterior complete with run-flat tires and a roomy interior with everything from a bedroom to a fridge.

Ensure you’re ready for whatever comes your way by signing up for BattlBox – the survival and tactical gear subscription box. Each month you’ll receive a care package of carefully curated items filled ideal for any emergency situation.

Secure your spot as the biggest baller in town by placing this massive Allosaurus dinosaur skeleton fossil on display in your living room. Discovered in Wyoming’s Bighorn mountains, this imposing fossil from the upper Jurassic stands 8 feet tall and measures 28 feet long.

South Korean biotech company Sooam has made the bold claim that they can clone your dog! For a cool 100K they’ll clone your recently deceased best friend so that you can continue to enjoy their company and friendship for generations to come.

The X-Plane is the supersonic passenger jet from NASA that looks to eliminate the extremely loud “boom” caused when breaking the sound barrier. Unlike the extremely noisy Concorde supersonic jet of yesteryear, the X-Plane looks to be quieter, greener, and safer.

Start brushing up on those Jedi skills because the laser saber – the non-fictional equivalent of the iconic lightsaber – has become a reality. It powers up and powers down within a magnetic gravity system, so you can mimic the functionality of a real lightsaber!

The patented Drawstring™ vapor delivery system is now vape ready, meaning it’s compatible with virtually every vape cartridge. The integrated design keeps the mouthpiece within reach, and the pen hidden and protected to prevent loss or damage. Vape nation!

Searching for love can be hard – especially for clowns. Luckily in today’s world of online dating we are fortunate enough to have sites like ClownDating.com. Now professional clowns and clown lovers can mingle and arrange dates with like-minded singles!

Improve your fighting skills by adding a dose of realism to your training by practicing with this smart dodging robotic punching bag. It features motion recognition sensors and a 19″ touchscreen that lets you control the bag and set drills.

Bring a little fun and internet humor into your drab workplace by decorating your desk with this Captain Picard facepalm bust. This officially licensed bust perfectly captures the now iconic scene from the Star Trek Next Generation episode “Deja Q”.

Become the envy of everyone at your local NRA chapter when you show up toting these meteorite pistols. These twin 1911 handguns are made from the Gibeon meteorite that crashed on Earth approximately 4.5 billion year ago.

This product is designed to keep you clean while driving in a car and eating or drinking or while eating at a restaurant or just while watching TV. A great gift for seniors, you can take it with you in its neat carrying case or hook onto your sunvisor.

Add a little color and flair to your bedroom by creating some quaint ambient lighting from this rainbow neon wall light. It can be easily mounted onto any wall and emits a colorful and soothing light that also makes this a great night light.

After a 25 year hiatus, the OG of console gaming is back and releasing the Atari VCS game system. This gaming console has a library of over 200 classic games and boasts features like 4K HDR and a 60fps AMD x86 processor.

If you want the ultimate concealable firearm then look no further than the world’s smallest revolver. Capable of firing real ammunition, this incredibly tiny yet functional handgun measures only 2.16 inches long and is a great gift idea for gun collectors, or tiny hitmen.

In celebration of the 50th anniversary of Stanley Kubrick’s seminal film 2001: A Space Odyssey, artist Simon Birch has painstakingly recreated the neo-classical hotel room from the penultimate scene of the iconic film that you can actually visit at the Smithsonian.

What better way to create a little mood lighting in your game room than with this PlayStation controller buttons light? This geeky USB and battery powered music reactive light piece measures approximately 12″ wide by 4″ tall and features 2 cool lighting modes.

These trailblazer firestarter sticks light like a match yet burn like a starter log. Each all-natural clean burning compressed wood stick is capped off with a match head for easy lighting and burns for roughly 10 minutes – providing ample time to light a roaring fire.

Bring carnival styled fun to your next pool day by inflating this three player aquatic arcade for the kids. It boasts three water guns that pit the three players in a race to see who can displace the plastic balls from the integrated cylinders using a small water blaster.
